channel.title: How To make An NPC Agressive 317 DELTA
channel.description:
[b]This is a tutorial on how to make npc's aggresive 317 DELTA what making an NPC AGRESSIVE means is that your making the npc attack you without you attacking it first!![/b]
Open up your NPCHandler.java
Search For: [code]public boolean npcGetsAnnoyed(int Npc) {[/code]
Here you should see probably case #'s: Now what your going to do is write:
case #NPCID: This Will make your NPC Agressive
Save & Close NPCHANDLER.java Compile your server and that npc will become aggressive
[b]If this Tutorial Helped you please show your feedback and if it didn't still show it[/b]
[b]Thanks Bye ~~~[/b]

This is a tutorial on how to make npc’s aggresive 317 DELTA what making an NPC AGRESSIVE means is that your making the npc attack you without you attacking it first!!

Open up your NPCHandler.java

Search For:
public boolean npcGetsAnnoyed(int Npc) {

Here you should see probably case #'s: Now what your going to do is write:

case #NPCID: This Will make your NPC Agressive
